entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023
